Author: gogturner
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOATERIUM | NEW TECHNOLOGY BANKING FOR CRYPTOCURRENCY
Body: FLOATERIUM NEW TECHNOLOGY BANKING FOR DIGITAL GENERATION    WHAT IS FLOATERIUM ?   Providing cryptocurrencies to mainstream everyday users, will require dedicated Float banking services. Only once a person is able to use cryptocurrency in the same way that they use any other currency, will all of the benefits of cryptocurrency, such as lower transaction costs, speed of payment, removal of national boundaries and so on, become real. There are already 3 million daily users of cryptocurrencies, a number that is expected to exceed 200 million by 2025. The demand for cryptocurrencies exists now and will grow at an annual CAGR of ~70% for the foreseeable future.  The potential to satisfy this demand is perhaps the most exciting banking development of the past 100 years and the prize for those who are successful is a place on the global banking landscape at a rate of growth and a worldwide presence that can never be matched by any traditional banking development plan.  Floaterium bank will be a first step in satisfying this demand. It will be made available for download via the IOS or android marketplace and is planning to be ready-to-use on mobile devices immediately. Unlike conventional mobile banks that take weeks to process and issue cards, the Floaterium bank provides an instant processing engine for both fiat and crypto based currency transactions while enabling inter-changeability between the two. With Floaterium's digital bank customers will finally be able to use cryptocurrencies to pay for fiat based goods without transaction. limits and with low commission on any of the world’s existing 42 million payment terminals and many internet stores and payment points. Floaterium's technology platform is developing to be based on algorithms that allow for the most efficient exchange rates matching across natural peer-to-peer flow as well as third party Crypto-exchanges. This is planned to be quickly followed by a range of complimentary banking services from simple Peer to Peer payments to Cryptocurrency backed lending.    PROBLEM While this is definitely a lot of complaining about the system of payment, which is now many systems that provide convenience. But all still use very strict rules, in addition to the tight is also provides convenience but to tax large enough.  SOLUTION In addition as a medium of payment, here as well as the media to develop a venture investors who will be assisted by a team of floaterium total. All transactions will be transparent and not require a device with a large fee for confirmation, all of it is set by the system-provided. In addition to a small transaction taxes, delivery time is accelerated so that it can also make it easier for users to do transaction.[/center]    WHY FLOATERIUM  NEW TECHNOLOGY New development adoption from Ethereum technology  FLOATERIUM CRYPTOBANK Payments, transfers, currency exchange, instant loans. Our goal - replace your bank  FLOATERIUM CRYPTOECONOMY Optimize the cryptocurrency exchange process and create own token  REAL TIME FRAUD MONITORING Provide information to any investor about some sites between the danger and safe  TRANSPARANT TRANSACTION All transactions will be reported in a transparent and nothing is covered  MOBILE BANK SOLUTION Facilitate the users to perform transactions with just one touch with the high security   ICO DETAILS  Cost 1 FLI: Start Price $0.02 Algorithm: X11 Decimal: 2 Total supply: 1.100.000.000 tokens Adjustable: All unsold tokens will be destroyed Purchase: Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) Hardcap: $30,000,000 USD   FLOATERIUM █ █ █ █   ➤ WEB➤ TWITTER  ➤ FACEBOOK ➤ WHITEPAPER ➤ TELEGRAM █ █ █ █  SPACE PRE ICO 1ST MARCH 2018 NEW TECHNOLOGY BANKING | CONTACT : CONTACT@FLOATERIUM.COM
